metadata.title: CVE-2024-49971 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Increase array size of dummy_boolean[WHY]dml2_core_shared_mode_support and dml_core_mode_support access the thirdelement of dummy_boolean, i.e. hw_debug5 = &s->dummy_boolean[2], whendummy_boolean has size of 2. Any assignment to hw_debug5 causes anOVERRUN.[HOW]Increase dummy_boolean's array size to 3.This fixes 2 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.
